id.description: The unique identifier for the email click event

prospect_id.description: The identifier of the prospect who clicked the email link

url.description: The URL that was clicked in the email

list_email_id.description: The identifier of the list email associated with the email click

drip_program_action_id.description: The identifier for the drip program action associated with the email click

email_template_id.description: The identifier of the email template related to the email click

tracker_redirect_id.description: The identifier for the tracker redirect associated with the email click

created_at.description: The date and time when the email click event occurred
